uk.gov.gchq.palisade.config.service.impl

Class SimpleConfigService

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.gov.gchq.palisade.config.service.impl.SimpleConfigService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ConfigurationService, Service

    public class SimpleConfigService
extends Object
implements ConfigurationService
    An implementation of ConfigurationService that uses the CacheService to provide all of its storage.

    All methods throw NullPointerException for any null parameters.

    • Method Detail

      • applyConfigFrom

        public void applyConfigFrom(ServiceConfiguration config)
                     throws NoConfigException
        Description copied from interface: Service
        Gives the initial configuration to a service to allow it to configure itself. This method is called by the internal system to configure a service.

        Subclasses should override this implementation which does nothing.

        Subclasses should ONLY throws NoConfigException if a required configuration key is not present

        Specified by:
        applyConfigFrom in interface Service
        Parameters:
        config - the configuration
        Throws:
        NoConfigException - if some required element of the configuration is not present

      • recordCurrentConfigTo

        public void recordCurrentConfigTo(ServiceConfiguration config)
        Description copied from interface: Service
        Tells a service to save its configuration to the given configuration object. This method is called by the internal system to save a configuration.

        Subclasses should override this implementation which does nothing.

        Specified by:
        recordCurrentConfigTo in interface Service
        Parameters:
        config - the configuration to place initial configuration information into

      • configureSelfFromCache

        public void configureSelfFromCache()
        Description copied from interface: ConfigurationService
        Instructs this configuration service to query its cache for extra configuration data. This may be called as part of a bootstrapping process. Once a ConfigurationService has been created with minimal configuration, this method can be called to cause it to retrieve any extra configuration information from the cache. It is an error to call this method before a cache service has been configured for an instance.
        Specified by:
        configureSelfFromCache in interface ConfigurationService

      • get

        public CompletableFuture<ServiceConfiguration> get(GetConfigRequest request)
                                            throws NoConfigException
        Get the initial configuration from Palisade. This is the entry method into the Palisade system.
        Specified by:
        get in interface ConfigurationService
        Parameters:
        request - the request that specifies what part of the system to request configuration for
        Returns:
        the configuration object
        Throws:
        NoConfigException - if no configuration for the given request code be found

      • add

        public CompletableFuture<Boolean> add(AddConfigRequest request)
        Allows new configuration data to be added to the cache.
        Specified by:
        add in interface ConfigurationService
        Parameters:
        request - the request to put in the cache
        Returns:
        a boolean that becomes true when the request is added to cache
